text: Dylan Farrow, whose brother Ronan helped expose predatory men in Hollywood, is asking why the man she accuses of sexual assault, Woody Allen, has largely been left out of the conversation. In an op - ed for the Los Angeles Times published on Thursday, Farrow calls out actresses Blake Lively, Kate Winslet and Greta Gerwig for continuing to support Allen, her adoptive father. Allen, an acclaimed filmmaker, has long denied the allegation, which Farrow first made publicly in 2014, and has continued to make movies, recently securing a multimillion - dollar deal with Amazon for his future projects.
